name: An authenticated Service Provider cannot send an RTP to an activated debtor
fullName: A Creditor Service Provider sends an RTP through API: An authenticated Service Provider cannot send an RTP to an activated debtor

steps.name: Given the debtor A has fiscal code random
And the debtor Service Provider is authenticated
Given the creditor Service Provider is authenticated
And the debtor Service Provider activated the debtor A
When the creditor Service Provider is unauthenticated
And the creditor Service Provider sends an RTP to the debtor A
Then the RTP is not created because the Service Provider is not authenticated

labels.name: feature
labels.value: A Creditor Service Provider sends an RTP through API
